title: Director of Software Engineering CX Human Frontline

pay_input_ranges.title: Washington State Pay Transparency Range
pay_input_ranges.blurb: For full-time positions, this pay range is for base per year; however, base pay offered may vary depending on location, job-related knowledge, education, skills, and experience. For part-time or intern positions, this pay range is for base pay per hour. A sign-on bonus and restricted stock units may be included in an employment offer, in addition to a range of medical, financial, and other benefits, based on eligibility criteria.

content:
At Qualtrics, we create software the world’s best brands use to deliver exceptional frontline experiences, build high-performing teams, and design products people love. But we are more than a platform—we are the creators and stewards of the Experience Management category serving over 18K clients globally. Building a category takes grit, determination, and a disdain for convention—but most of all it requires close-knit, high-functioning teams with an unwavering dedication to serving our customers. ,,When you join one of our teams, you’ll be part of a nimble group that’s empowered to set aggressive goals and move fast to achieve them. Strategic risks are encouraged and complex problems are solved together, by passing the mic and iterating until the best solution comes to light. You won’t have to look to find growth opportunities—ready or not, they’ll find you. From retail to government to healthcare, we’re on a mission to bring humanity, connection, and empathy back to business. Join over 6,000 people across the globe who think that’s work worth doing.
Senior Director of Software Engineering / Human Frontline
Why We Have This Role
Qualtrics XM is the backbone of the world’s most successful companies. Our secure, agile, easy-to-use platform is a common framework for entire companies to design and improve customer and employee experiences - and to consistently drive innovation in a world where people demand ever more from products, brands, and experiences. The Human Frontline organization, powers organization's frontline employees with actionable insights. It is responsible for providing the underlying technologies that surface power insights and drive actions for the contact center and agents on the frontline of customer experience management.
How You’ll Find Success


Create mechanisms that ensure designs are high quality, scalable, and sustainable
Continually find ways to automate and optimize development processes and drive innovation
Develop and maintain strong collaborative relationships with key stakeholders across the company and serve as an advocate for the function
Manage several high-performing managers and teams


How You’ll Grow

As a (Senior) Director, Software Engineering you will guide several teams of engineers in building simple solutions to solve hard scalability problems
You will drive product and platform development from roadmap planning through engineering execution to production operations.
You will be responsible for leading and developing a team of seasoned managers that focus on specific areas of the platform.

Things You’ll Do


Define the vision and strategy for several engineering teams
Design and influence product strategy
Recruit, build and develop high performing engineering teams and leaders
Communicate and drive engineering initiatives across functions


What We’re Looking For On Your Resume


BS/MS in Computer Science or related degree
10+ years of software engineering experience with demonstrated knowledge of engineering best-practices
5+ years experience managing engineering managers
Demonstrated success building and leading high-performing cross-functional engineering teams
In-depth technical knowledge on common technologies used as infrastructure
Experience working with technologies used by software developers to develop, test, deploy, and operate their services. These include, but are not limited to Docker, Nomad, Kubernetes, Puppet, and Terraform.
Proven track record of successfully tackling large, ambiguous, problems
Strong interpersonal and communication skills.


What You Should Know About This Team


Customer Care provides world-class experience management for the contact center. Including but not exclusive to understanding  insights from structured and unstructured data.
Leveraging the latest in NLU and NLP to drive customer loyalty and prevent customer churn. This includes offerings such as real-time agent assist, quality assurance and management for call centers and analytics to ensure frontline compliance.
Location XM provides industry leading omni-channel touch point management. Including the ability to uncover insights from a variety of channels, including social reviews and aggregators, chat & direct messages - meeting your customers where they interact.  This includes offerings such as online review management and frontline engagement and productivity tools.


Our Team’s Favorite Perks and Benefits


We lead the industry in workplace experience. Qualtrics boasts top-tier offices, wellness programs, employee experience cash allowances, and relocation stipends that include additional funds for those with dependents.
We lead the industry in workplace experience. Qualtrics boasts top-tier offices, wellness programs, and employee experience cash allowances.
In addition to the standard employee benefits package (medical, dental, vision, life insurance, etc) we also provide snacks, drinks, and free lunches in our offices


 For full-time positions, this pay range is for base per year; however, base pay offered may vary depending on location, job-related knowledge, education, skills, and experience. For part-time or intern positions, this pay range is for base pay per hour. A sign-on bonus and restricted stock units may be included in an employment offer, in addition to a range of medical, financial, and other benefits, based on eligibility criteria.Washington State Pay Transparency Range$251,500—$419,500 USD

compliance.description: <p>PUBLIC BURDEN STATEMENT: According to the Paperwork Reduction Act of 1995 no persons are required to respond to a collection of information unless such collection displays a valid OMB control number. This survey should take about 5 minutes to complete.</p>

demographic_questions.description:
Why are you being asked to fill out two sets of demographic questions? Qualtrics is required by the federal government to distribute the Equal Employment Opportunity questions exactly as they are written. However, we recognize that the questions do not fully capture the fullness of a person’s identity and experience when it comes to gender identity, sexual orientation and race. DEI (Diversity, Equity and Inclusion) is a cornerstone of our company culture. We are committed to inclusivity in our hiring process and want to give you the opportunity to self-describe your identity.


With this in mind, we invite you to participate in this additional set of voluntary demographic questions. The data collected will be used anonymously and in aggregate, so we can evaluate our processes to ensure we’re providing equal opportunities to applicants from all backgrounds. Your responses, or your choice not to respond, will not be associated with your specific application and will not in any way be used for individual hiring or compensation decisions.
